book.workingLayouts:
Presets

Here you will find a collection of presets to change the appearance of your working area.

Experiment and switch between them during your work.
book.settings:
Settings

Click to open book settings. Change the book name, description, and cover.
book.chapters:
Chapters

Click to open the chapters panel. Here you can add, remove, and reorder chapters.

Create nested sub-chapters for various purposes: write side stories, add notes or use them as drafts.
book.wikis:
Wikis

Click to open the wikis panel. Here you can add, remove, and reorder wikis.

Wikis are independent from the book and can be used to organize your ideas and research.

Create nested sub-wikis to organize information about characters, events, and locations. These wikis can be easily referenced within the text while writing, so feel free to experiment with their settings.
book.ignore:
Ignore

Here you can add words to be ignored during the spellchecking of your texts, list them through comma separated values.
book.layoutToolbar:
Layout Toolbar

Here you can change the layout of your working area.

It's not connected to your texts or wikis (so don't be afraid to experiment), it's just the way how you display working area.

You also can use Presets menu on the top to change layout fast.
